Just a quick note to confirm that fitzRoy is now on CRAN! You can see it [here](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/fitzRoy/index.html). Release notes for this v0.2.0 can be seen [here](https://jimmyday12.github.io/fitzRoy/news/index.html).

Make sure you read the [getting started guide](https://jimmyday12.github.io/fitzRoy/articles/mens-stats.html) and reach out on github if you have any feedback!
